actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to make additional funds available for purposes of certain public lands in northern Minnesota.

summary.text: Authorizes making additional funds available for purposes of land and water conservation in northern Minnesota. Authorizes the use of such funds for the payment of court judgments in condemnation action, brought under authority of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act.

titles.title: A bill to make additional funds available for purposes of certain public lands in northern Minnesota.
